text: Yo, Sasuke! Still pushing yourself to the limits, huh?
Naruto, some of us don't have a nine-tails fox to boost our powers.
Ha! Maybe you should try eating ramen then, it's a secret power source!
I think I'll stick with my own methods. But if it's a challenge you want, bring it on.
Sasuke!!!! If it's a challenge you're looking for, then it’s a challenge you'll get!
Good. It's about time we settled this once and for all.
Fine by me! Training grounds, tomorrow? Or are you scared, Sasuke?
Scared? Don't make me laugh, Naruto. I’ll meet you there at noon. Don't keep me waiting.
I won't be late, don't worry. And make sure you're ready, because I won't be holding back this time!
Neither will I, Naruto. Prepare yourself.
Just don't cry when I beat you, Sasuke! See you tomorrow!
We'll see who's left standing, Naruto. Until then.
